features.description: Features used on the website to rate videos

search_divider_coefficient.description: divide search score by this value

search_feature_constant_add.description: add this value to Tournesol scores

youtubeVideoIdRegexSymbol.description: Regular expression of YouTube videos (one symbol)

minNumRateLater.description: Minimal number of videos to rate before redirecting to rating page

Disagreement.description: Serialize disagreements between ratings and the representative.

model_score.description: The score that the model gives, in 0..100.0

rating_score.description: The score that you gave, in 0..100.0

mse_01.description: Mean squared error between model and rating scores, in 0-1

n_verified_emails.description: Number of verified emails with ths domain

duration_ms.description: Time it took to rate the videos (in milliseconds)

Feature.description: Serialize features used to rate videos.

detail.description:
Reason code for error, explanation:
UNKNOWN: Unknown error
DB_ERROR: Unknown database error
PK_ERROR: Invalid primary key
NO_VIDEOS: No videos in the system
ALREADY_EXISTS: Object already exists

enum: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

n_thanks.description: Number of people I thanked for this video

new_score_left.description: New value for my score for the left video

new_score_right.description: New value for my score for the right video

agg_score_left.description: New value for aggregated score for the left video

agg_score_right.description: New value for aggregated score for the right video

OnlyUsername.description: Serialize user information, give only username.

duration_ms.description: Time it took to rate the videos (in milliseconds)

PatchedLogin.description: Log in a user with username and a password

n_likes.description: Number of likes minus number of dislikes for comments

n_thanks_given.description: Number of thank you for recommendations given

n_thanks_received.description: Number of thank you for recommendations received

show_online_presence.description: Show my online presence on Tournesol

username.description: Username for this user preferences' user

rating_mode.description: Which sliders and parameters to display on the rating page?

anonymized_username_id.description: ID of the hash of the username

datetime_lastedit.description: Time the comment was edited the last time

edited_m_added_s.description: Edited minus created time in seconds

shrivacy_policy.description: I have read and I accept the privacy policy

enum: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

detail.description:
Reason code for error, explanation:
UNKNOWN: Unknown error
DB_ERROR: Unknown database error
PK_ERROR: Invalid primary key
NO_VIDEOS: No videos in the system
ALREADY_EXISTS: Object already exists
NO_FEATURES: No features selected as active
NO_RATE_LATER_NO_RATED: Rate later list is empty, and list of rated videos is empty
NO_RATE_LATER_ALL_RATED: Rate later list is empty, and all videos are rated against each other in terms of all quality features
FIRST_RATED_AGAINST_ALL_RATED: First video was rated against all other rated videos

duration_ms.description: Time from page load to this slider value (in milliseconds)

context.description: The page where slider change occurs

certified_experts.description: Number of experts with certified e-mails

videos.description: Total number of videos in the database

min_score.description: Minimal aggregated score over all videos and features

max_score.description: Maximal aggregated score over all videos and features

weekly_active_ratings.description: Number of ratings added within a week

n_rated_videos.description: Total number of videos with ratings

n_likes.description: Number of likes minus number of dislikes for comments

n_thanks_given.description: Number of thank you for recommendations given

n_thanks_received.description: Number of thank you for recommendations received

show_online_presence.description: Show my online presence on Tournesol

UserInformationSerializerNameOnly.description: Only show username of the person.

username.description: Username for this user preferences' user

rating_mode.description: Which sliders and parameters to display on the rating page?

anonymized_username_id.description: ID of the hash of the username

datetime_lastedit.description: Time the comment was edited the last time

edited_m_added_s.description: Edited minus created time in seconds

id.description: ID of the video rate later object

public_username.description: The person who left the rating

n_comparisons.description: Number of all pairwise comparisons for the video by the person

video_id.description: Video ID from YouTube URL, matches ^[A-Za-z0-9-_]+$

tournesol_score.description: The total Tournesol score with uniform preferences (value=50.0)

largely_recommended_quantile.description: Top quantile for largely_recommended for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

reliability_quantile.description: Top quantile for reliability for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

importance_quantile.description: Top quantile for importance for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

engaging_quantile.description: Top quantile for engaging for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

pedagogy_quantile.description: Top quantile for pedagogy for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

layman_friendly_quantile.description: Top quantile for layman_friendly for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

diversity_inclusion_quantile.description: Top quantile for diversity_inclusion for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

backfire_risk_quantile.description: Top quantile for backfire_risk for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

better_habits_quantile.description: Top quantile for better_habits for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst

entertaining_relaxing_quantile.description: Top quantile for entertaining_relaxing for all rated videos for aggregated scores. 0.0=best, 1.0=worst
